LanguageData.NVRaceNote: Note: to get the full effect of these settings the individual must have all their natural eyes. Losing an eye or replacing it with a prosthetic will affect the final result; implants that do not remove the eye will not, nor will injuries.
LanguageData.NVRaceQualifier: Requires all eyes to be natural.
LanguageData.NVHediffQualifier: Full effect requires all eyes to have this.
LanguageData.NVHediffExplained: The conditions listed here are limited to those that are applied directly to the eye, or explicitly affect sight, or have particular modded files.
LanguageData.NVHediffNote: Note: for conditions that effect the eye directly (e.g. bionic eyes) the night vision and photosensitivity settings require all eyes to have that condition to get the full effect.
LanguageData.NVHediffNoteCont: For example, if both luciferium and bionic eyes were set to give night vision; an individual with just one bionic eye would get half the night vision bonus, but on luciferium they would get the full bonus.
